Constructor Detail

DescriptionTreeView

public DescriptionTreeView(boolean isExpanded)
Set up a basic empty tree, but add the root and a single chain. The expand flag is for the TreeList in the main app.

Parameters:
isExpanded - whether to expand the tree

DescriptionTreeView

public DescriptionTreeView(Description description)
Create the tree from an existing Description.

Parameters:
description - the Description tree to display

Count the number of trees in this view.

Returns:
the number of Description trees contained herein.

Adds a Description tree to the end of the list.

Parameters:
descriptionTree - the tree to add

addTree

public void addTree(Description description,
                    int index)
Add a tree to the list of trees at a particular index in the children of the root. If the index is greater than the number of trees (-1), then add to the end of the list.

Parameters:
description - the root of the tree to add
index - the position to add it at

recursivelyAdd

public void recursivelyAdd(javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode current,
                           Description description)

addDescriptionToChildOfCurrentlySelectedNode

public void addDescriptionToChildOfCurrentlySelectedNode(java.lang.String name,
                                                         int position)
The simplest method for adding new Descriptions to the tree. Asks the tree for its current selection (if any) and adds the appropriate type of child. Dangerous, as it assumes that if there is no current selection, there is no tree...

Parameters:
name - the Description's name.
position - in case the Description is a group.

addDescriptionToNewChildNode

public void addDescriptionToNewChildNode(javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode node,
                                         Description description)
Append a new child node to the parent node and add the description to it.

Parameters:
node - the parent node
description - the user object to add

addDescriptionToNode

public void addDescriptionToNode(javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode node,
                                 Description description)
Add a description to a node. Note that this method does NOT have the side-effect of adding the description to the parent node's description.

Parameters:
node - the treenode to add the description to
description - the description to add

getCurrentlySelectedDescription

public Description getCurrentlySelectedDescription()
Note that this method does NOT return the whole Description of which a particular node may be selected, but only the Description at that node (which references all subdescriptions).

Returns:
the Description at the currently selected node

createPathToSelected

public Description createPathToSelected()
Creates a Description path to the selected node.

Returns:
the root of a new description path
